comment: Smart Data Models - Data Service Run extension to DCAT-AP adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.DCAT-AP/master/DataServiceRun/schema.json
description: A representation of one specific run of a data service (e.g. DataServiceDCAT-AP).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: configuration
contents.comment: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Technical configuration of the service. This attribute is intended to be an array of properties and their values which capture parameters which have to do with the configuration of a service (output format, URL, etc.) and which are not currently covered by the standard attributes defined by this model.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: resultEntities
contents.comment: Relationship. A list of references pointing to NGSI-LD entities that were generated within a service run.

contents.name: resultExternal
contents.comment: Property. A list of uri pointing to external results that were generated within a service run.

contents.name: sourceEntities
contents.comment: Relationship. A list of references pointing to NGSI-LD entities that acted as source within a service run.

contents.name: sourceExternal
contents.comment: Property. A list of uri pointing to external results that acted as source within a service run.
